name: Man-Made Meteorite
desc: Gains 1–3 random Blessings for the current Path after obtaining this Curio
bg_desc: Within the span of a century, three geniuses who drew the gaze of the Erudition Aeon were born on the same planet. They were Bohdan #7, Lambda #8, and Klein #9. Hence, this epoch was known as the "Golden Age." Rumor has it that something of a romantic comedy unfolded between the trio, as during this time, Klein — #9 of Genius Society — once created a man-made meteorite for #7, Bohdan, and upon the meteorite's surface existed a replica of the Eye of Erudition.
